programHelper.title: Program Creation Guidelines

welcome.title: Welcome to Program Creation Assistant
welcome.description: Use this guide to create effective and professional support programs. Follow these guidelines to ensure your program meets quality standards and achieves the best outcomes.

counseling.name: Individual Counseling
counseling.description: One-on-one sessions for personalized psychological support and guidance.

skillsDevelopment.name: Skills Development
skillsDevelopment.description: Group programs focusing on developing specific psychological and social skills.

groupTherapy.name: Group Therapy
groupTherapy.description: Therapeutic sessions conducted in small groups with shared experiences.

workshop.name: Educational Workshop
workshop.description: Short-term intensive programs for learning specific topics or techniques.

support.name: Support Group
support.description: Peer support groups for ongoing emotional and psychological assistance.

participants.title: Participant Management
participants.rule2: Smaller groups (10-15) work better for therapy and counseling
participants.rule3: Larger groups (20-50) are suitable for workshops and training
participants.rule4: Consider facilitator capacity when setting participant limits

duration.title: Program Duration
duration.rule1: Minimum 5 days advance booking required for proper preparation
duration.rule2: Short programs (1-3 days): workshops, seminars, training sessions
duration.rule3: Medium programs (4-8 weeks): skill development, support groups
duration.rule4: Long programs (8+ weeks): therapy, comprehensive treatment plans

format.title: Format Selection
format.rule1: Online format: best for educational content and remote accessibility
format.rule2: Offline format: ideal for hands-on therapy and personal interaction
format.rule3: Consider participant technology access for online programs
format.rule4: Ensure appropriate facilities and resources for chosen format

content.title: Content & Structure
content.rule1: Define clear, measurable learning objectives and outcomes
content.rule2: Create detailed session plans with activities and materials
content.rule3: Include assessment methods and progress tracking mechanisms
content.rule4: Plan for follow-up support and resource provision

preparation.title: Program Preparation
preparation.tip1: Conduct needs assessment before program design
preparation.tip2: Prepare comprehensive materials and resources in advance
preparation.tip3: Train facilitators and establish clear protocols

execution.title: Program Execution
execution.tip2: Monitor progress and adjust content as needed
execution.tip3: Document sessions and maintain detailed records

mistakes.title: Common Mistakes to Avoid
mistakes.warning: Avoid these common pitfalls when creating programs:
mistakes.mistake1: Setting unrealistic participant numbers or duration expectations
mistakes.mistake2: Insufficient preparation time (less than 5 days advance notice)
mistakes.mistake3: Choosing inappropriate format for content type or participant needs
mistakes.mistake4: Lack of clear objectives or measurable outcomes
mistakes.mistake5: Inadequate follow-up planning or resource allocation

programHelper.footer: This helper provides general guidelines. Always consider specific organizational policies and participant needs.

systemConfig.title: System Configuration
systemConfig.rawValueNote: Values are edited in raw form. Do not set language-specific text here (no EN/VI variants).
